Package entity

Class Enquiry

Object
Enquiry
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Enquiry extends Object implements Serializable
An enquiry made by an applicant regarding a project. The enquiry includes a header, text, and an optional reply.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Applicant applicant, Project project, String enquiryHeader, String enquiryText)
      Constructs an enquiry for a given applicant and project with a specified header and text. The enquiry is added to both the applicant and project.
      Parameters:
      applicant - The applicant who made the enquiry.
      project - The project the enquiry is about.
      enquiryHeader - The header/title of the enquiry.
      enquiryText - The body of the enquiry.

  • Method Details

    • isAnswered

      public boolean isAnswered()
      Checks if the enquiry has been answered by checking if a reply exists.
      Returns:
      true if the enquiry has a reply, false otherwise.

    • setReply

      public void setReply(String reply)
      Sets the reply for the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      reply - The reply text.

    • viewEnquiries

      public static boolean viewEnquiries(List<Enquiry> enquiries)
      Displays a list of all enquiries.
      Parameters:
      enquiries - The list of enquiries to be displayed.
      Returns:
      true if there are enquiries to display, false if no enquiries exist.

    • editEnquiry

      public void editEnquiry(String text)
      Edits the enquiry by updating its text and appending "(Edited)" to the header if not already appended.
      Parameters:
      text - The new text for the enquiry.

    • deleteEnquiry

      public void deleteEnquiry(Data data)
      Deletes the enquiry by removing it from both the applicant's and the project's enquiry list, and from the global data list.
      Parameters:
      data - The data object containing the list of all enquiries.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the enquiry, including the header, text, and reply (if any).
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A formatted string showing the enquiry header, text, and reply.
